testcase.classname: User could register to the system successfully
testcase.name: User could register successfully with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to register page........................................passed Then Guest user should be directed to registering page......................passed When User select gender.....................................................passed And Insert valid Firstname..................................................passed And Insert valid Lastname...................................................passed And Enter his birthday......................................................passed And Enter his birthmonth....................................................passed And Enter his birthyear.....................................................passed And Enter valid email.......................................................passed And Enter any company name..................................................passed And Enter valid password....................................................passed And Confirm recently entered password.......................................passed And Click register button...................................................passed Then the user should be registered successfully.............................passed And a success green message is displayed....................................passed

testcase.classname: Log in to the system successfully
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When Insert enter valid email...............................................passed And Insert valid password...................................................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then The user should be logged in successfully..............................passed

testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully

failure.message: expected [By.className: content] but found [Email with instructions has been sent to you.]

testcase.failure:
Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Given User clicks on forget password button.................................passed Then User navigates to password recovery page...............................passed And User enters the email he wants to reset the passowrd at.................passed And User clicks on recover button...........................................passed Then A reset confirmation message appears...................................failed

testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be logged in successfully.............................passed When User click on currencies DDL then click on Euro sign...................passed Then Currency changes from US to Euro.......................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be logged in successfully.............................passed Given User click on search field............................................passed And Start typing favoured product name......................................passed And Click on search button..................................................passed Then User should be directed to search result page..........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be logged in successfully.............................passed When User hover with mouse on Apparel category..............................passed And User click on shoes sub-category in DDL.................................passed Then User heads to Apparel category page....................................passed

testcase.classname: User navigate to website's social pages
testcase.name: user visits facebook page
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be logged in successfully.............................passed Given user clicks on facebook link..........................................passed Then user heads to "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" page..............passed

testcase.classname: User navigate to website's social pages
testcase.name: user visits twitter page
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be logged in successfully.............................passed Given user clicks on twitter link...........................................passed Then user heads to "https://twitter.com/nopCommerce" page...................passed
